Third Iron | http://thirdiron.com | Minneapolis | Full Time | iOS & Android | REMOTE

We are a remote-first company since our inception in 2011. We build software to help academic libraries and researchers stay up-to-date with peer reviewed journals.

We are looking for a passionate mobile developer to help architect, write automated tests, and build our iOS (Obj-C/Swift) and Android (Java) app, BrowZine, in use by academic researchers around the world in a wide variety of fields, whether STEM, social sciences, humanities, and beyond.

Using Obj-C and Swift, Cocoapods, XCTest, and CircleCI for the iOS app, and Java, Gradle, Roboelectric, and CircleCI for the Android app.

We have a small dev team where your contributions and input will make an immediate impact.

If you want to work on both iOS and Android on a great team of polyglot programmers, email info@thirdiron.com
